name: River Raid 2.0
description:
Reimagined game from the Atari era

Our vision for River Raid brings the game into the third dimension, giving you full aerial controls of the plane. To add more flair to the concept, River Raid 2.0 is also the imagination of a child come to life! Little Timmy is playing around with his toys, having a blast. Take control of his plane and fly around the playground, shooting down enemy Blimps and Ships, while going through rings to get a speed boost! 

Can you get the highest score?

Controls 

The game uses the controls from the original Atari, that is, a joystick (8-directional) and a single button.

Use WASD or Gamepad Left Stick to move the plane.

Use ENTER or Gamepad A (X on PS layout) to shoot.
